activities: Amplitude is an online analytics service that collects data about application usage for mobile and web applications for its customers. Amplitude does not claim any ownership rights in and to any customer data. Amplitude may collect non-personally identifiable information regarding the behavior and usage patterns of users of mobile applications published by our customers. Amplitude’s customers use this information to determine how users of the application are using the application and how they can make improvements.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The personal data that is processed about a user includes Country, City, Region, information about their device (platform, operating system, device type), and their carrier.
